name: Senator Oluremi Tinubu CON
title: First Lady of the Federal Republic of Nigeria
bio: Project visionary and namesake. Author of 'The Journey of Grace' autobiography, serving as a case study for role modelling through hard work, discipline, integrity, and faith.

name: Oba Enitan Adeyeye Ogunwusi CON
title: Ooni of Ife

image.alt: Portrait of the Ooni of Ife

bio: Conceptualized and donated the building. Championed the project since 2019, transforming a former jungle area into a symbol of perseverance and collective commitment.

name: Kashifu Inuwa Abdullahi
title: Director General, NITDA

image.alt: Portrait of the NITDA Director General

bio: Equipped the facility with IT-enabled devices and AI tools, using digital technology, artificial intelligence, and storytelling to preserve our history.

name: Professor Adebayo Simeon Bamire
title: Vice-Chancellor, Obafemi Awolowo University
bio: Provided the land and hosts the centre at OAU, a premier institution chosen for its legacy of academic excellence and youth development.
